parameters.name: HubName
parameters.description: The name of the hub to describe.

nested_items.name: HubArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the hub.

nested_items.name: HubDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the hub.

nested_items.name: HubSearchKeywords
nested_items.description: The searchable keywords for the hub.

nested_items.name: S3StorageConfig
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 storage configuration for the hub.

nested_items.name: S3OutputPath
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket prefix for hosting hub content.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The failure reason if importing hub content failed.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the hub was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the hub was last modified.
